name: Inside The Crystal Mountain
description:
Explore a small, but dense, world filled with objects to find, characters to talk to, and new abilities to unlock. Featuring fast-paced and precise combat, every movement is critical, demanding skill and strategy to navigate through intense battles. You will progress through the experience gained, incremental upgrades, shortcuts, and secrets. As if that wasn't enough, you will be involved in a science fiction story that slowly reveals its secrets, challenging you to piece together its hidden narrative.

INSIDE THE CRYSTAL MOUNTAIN


Combat is fluid, fast, and precise. Just one rule: never stop moving.



Death is not the end of everything. Learn from your mistakes. Memorize attack patterns and enemy positions: whatever you face will expand your knowledge of the game.



Someone will try to deceive you. Others will try to help you. But who can you really trust?



Explore. Explore. Explore. Objects, upgrades, skills, mysterious characters, and challenging bosses are there just to be discovered.



And when you feel ready... there will be giant robots waiting for you. Will you be able to defeat them?
